required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Biomarkers for Prediction of and Diagnosis of Ventilator-associated Pneumonia

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate different peptide biomarkers, variations in the microbiome and patterns in the bacterial transcriptome as prognostic or diagnostic biomarkers of VAP.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in HBP concentration over time
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1, 3 and in selected patients day 7 and 14. In patients with VAP also VAP day 1, 3 and 7.
primary_outcome.description: Change in concentration (ng/ml) compared to baseline.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1, 3 and in selected patients day 7 and 14. In patients with VAP also VAP day 1, 3 and 7.
primary_outcome.description: Change in concentration (ng/ml) compared to baseline.

primary_outcome.time_frame: VAP day 1 compared to No VAP day 3
primary_outcome.description: Concentration at VAP day 1, compared to day 3 in patients with no VAP. ROC curves, specificity and sensitivity as diagnostic biomarker.

primary_outcome.time_frame: VAP day 1 compared to No VAP day 3
primary_outcome.description: Concentration at VAP day 1, compared to day 3 in patients with no VAP. ROC curves, specificity and sensitivity as diagnostic biomarker.

secondary_outcome.description: Changes in alpha and beta diversity as prognostic biomarker for VAP. Cases that develop VAP are compared to cases with no VAP.
Patterns in the bacterial gene expression that predict antibiotic drug treatment failure.

other_outcome.description: A scale from 0-100 of the diagnostic certainty by ICU physicians and nurses

other_outcome.time_frame: Day 1, 3 and in selected patients day 7 and 14. In patients with VAP also VAP day 1, 3 and 7.
other_outcome.description: Compare cases with VAP to No VAP

other_outcome.measure: Change in Differential blood cell counts
other_outcome.time_frame: Day 1, 3 and in selected patients day 7 and 14. In patients with VAP also VAP day 1, 3 and 7.
other_outcome.description: Compare cases with VAP to No VAP

other_outcome.time_frame: Day 1, 3 and in selected patients day 7 and 14. In patients with VAP also VAP day 1, 3 and 7.
other_outcome.description: Compare cases with VAP to No VAP

other_outcome.time_frame: Day 1, 3 and in selected patients day 7 and 14. In patients with VAP also VAP day 1, 3 and 7.
other_outcome.description: Compare cases with VAP to No VAP
Results from cultures at the clinical microbiology laboratory. Results will be correlated to bacterial species identification in mini-BAL.

other_outcome.measure: Change in Acute Physiology And Chronic Health Evaluation II (APACHE II)
other_outcome.time_frame: Day 1, 3 and in selected patients day 7 and 14. In patients with VAP also VAP day 1, 3 and 7.
other_outcome.description: Compare score between cases with VAP and no VAP.

other_outcome.measure: Change in Sequential Organ Failure Assessment (SOFA)
other_outcome.time_frame: Day 1, 3 and in selected patients day 7 and 14. In patients with VAP also VAP day 1, 3 and 7.
other_outcome.description: Compare score between cases with VAP and no VAP.

other_outcome.measure: Change in Simplified Acute Physiology Score III (Saps3)
other_outcome.time_frame: Day 1, 3 and in selected patients day 7 and 14. In patients with VAP also VAP day 1, 3 and 7.
other_outcome.description: Compare score between cases with VAP and no VAP.

arm_group.description: Enrolled participants that fully meet the criteria of VAP.
Enrolled participants that develop signs of VAP but lack some variable, for instace new radiographic infiltrate or microbiological finding compatible with VAP.
Enrolled participants that do not develop VAP.

intervention.description: Evaluation of the specificity and sensitivity of HBP as diagnostic biomarker for VAP.
Evaluation of the specificity and sensitivity of IL-26 as diagnostic biomarker for VAP.
Evaluation of the specificity and sensitivity of the lung microbiome as prognostic biomarker for VAP.
Evaluation of the specificity and sensitivity of the bacterial transcriptome as prognostic biomarker for treatment failure of VAP.
Evaluation of the specificity and sensitivity of the proteome in mini-BAL as biomarker for VAP.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Admission to an intensive care unit
- Intubation within last 24 hours
- Anticipated mechanical ventilation of at least 48 hours
Exclusion Criteria:
- FiO2 above 80%

facility.name: Skåne University Hospital, Dept. of Infectious diseases

patient_data.ipd_description: Individual participant data that underlie the results reported in this article will be shared with investigators after deidentification.
patient_data.ipd_time_frame: IPD will be available from 6 months to 5 years after publication.
patient_data.ipd_access_criteria: Approval of the relevant ethical board
